job_details.Vacaturetitel: Principal Software Engineer - GenAI Platform Development
job_details.Functieomschrijving:
As a Principal Software Engineer, you will be at the forefront of designing and implementing advanced Generative AI (GenAI) services. Your role will focus on crafting reusable, scalable AI capabilities that serve as the foundation for a variety of applications. You will leverage your strong analytical and problem-solving skills, coupled with expert-level coding and refactoring experience, to drive innovation and efficiency within our engineering teams.
   Responsibilities:
     * Lead the design and development of robust GenAI services that can be leveraged across multiple product lines and use cases.
     * Implement best practices in code modularity, reusability, and maintainability, ensuring our AI services are future-proof and adaptable to evolving requirements.
     * Collaborate closely with cross-functional teams to integrate AI services into our broader product ecosystem, prioritizing ease of use and developer experience.
     * Continuously analyze and improve existing AI services for performance enhancements and to align with current industry standards.
     * Serve as a technical mentor to other engineers, promoting a culture of technical excellence and shared ownership of code quality.
     * Drive innovation by staying abreast of the latest advancements in AI technologies and programming practices, evaluating their potential application within our services.
job_details.full_text:
Principal Software Engineer - GenAI Platform Development

As a Principal Software Engineer, you will be at the forefront of designing and implementing advanced Generative AI (GenAI) services. Your role will focus on crafting reusable, scalable AI capabilities that serve as the foundation for a variety of applications. You will leverage your strong analytical and problem-solving skills, coupled with expert-level coding and refactoring experience, to drive innovation and efficiency within our engineering teams.
   Responsibilities:
     * Lead the design and development of robust GenAI services that can be leveraged across multiple product lines and use cases.
     * Implement best practices in code modularity, reusability, and maintainability, ensuring our AI services are future-proof and adaptable to evolving requirements.
     * Collaborate closely with cross-functional teams to integrate AI services into our broader product ecosystem, prioritizing ease of use and developer experience.
     * Continuously analyze and improve existing AI services for performance enhancements and to align with current industry standards.
     * Serve as a technical mentor to other engineers, promoting a culture of technical excellence and shared ownership of code quality.
     * Drive innovation by staying abreast of the latest advancements in AI technologies and programming practices, evaluating their potential application within our services.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description emphasizes designing, developing, and implementing advanced Generative AI (GenAI) services, focusing on building reusable and scalable AI capabilities. It highlights responsibilities like leading the design and development of GenAI services, implementing best practices for maintainability, collaborating on integration into product ecosystems, and staying abreast of the latest AI advancements. These align directly with the core responsibilities and evidence profile of a GenAI Engineer, particularly in building and maintaining production-grade user-facing software systems powered by generative models.

job_tasks.justification: The role involves 'designing and implementing advanced Generative AI (GenAI) services', 'crafting reusable, scalable AI capabilities', 'implement best practices in code modularity, reusability, and maintainability', and 'integrate AI services into our broader product ecosystem'. This indicates a focus on building and maintaining software systems around AI capabilities.
job_tasks.phrase: designing and implementing advanced Generative AI (GenAI) services

job_tasks.justification: The description mentions 'implement best practices in code modularity, reusability, and maintainability, ensuring our AI services are future-proof and adaptable to evolving requirements', which are core software engineering principles applied to AI services.
job_tasks.phrase: Implement best practices in code modularity, reusability, and maintainability

job_tasks.justification: The responsibility to 'Collaborate closely with cross-functional teams to integrate AI services into our broader product ecosystem' points to the software development aspect of making AI capabilities available within a larger product.
job_tasks.phrase: integrate AI services into our broader product ecosystem

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Continuously analyze and improve existing AI services for performance enhancements' implies working with and optimizing the underlying AI models.
job_tasks.phrase: analyze and improve existing AI services for performance enhancements

job_tasks.justification: The focus on 'reusable, scalable AI capabilities' and ensuring services are 'future-proof and adaptable' suggests a need for robust deployment and maintenance practices, which fall under MLOps.

While not explicitly detailed, the 'design and development of robust GenAI services' and 'improving existing AI services for performance enhancements' often require underlying data preparation and feature engineering, though this is less emphasized than software development.
job_tasks.phrase: design and development of robust GenAI services

job_tasks.justification: The responsibility to 'stay abreast of the latest advancements in AI technologies and programming practices, evaluating their potential application within our services' directly relates to understanding and potentially adapting generative models.
job_tasks.phrase: stay abreast of the latest advancements in AI technologies

soft_skills.phrase: Serve as a technical mentor to other engineers, promoting a culture of technical excellence and shared ownership of code quality.
staying abreast of the latest advancements in AI technologies
